image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from California; born in Columbus, Franklin County, Ohio, December 10, 1961; B.A., University of Kentucky, Lexington, Ky., 1984; J.D., Capital University, Columbus, Ohio, 1986; M.B.A., Ohio State University, Columbus, Ohio, 2002; lawyer, private practice; business executive; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-January 3, 2021); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress in 2020.

asset.name: R000616_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
